meanings.definition: Make (an idea, situation, or problem) clear to someone by describing it in more detail.
meanings.sent1: She explained the math problem to her friend using colorful markers.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the science experiment step by step.
meanings.sent3: The cat explained to the dog why chasing its tail was pointless.
meanings.sent4: The map explained the winding road ahead with dotted lines.
meanings.sent5: The guide dog explained the route to the visually impaired woman with gentle nudges.

meanings.definition: Give a reason or justification for (an action or event).
meanings.sent1: He explained his absence from the meeting due to a sudden illness.
meanings.sent2: The witness explained the sequence of events leading up to the accident.
meanings.sent3: The clown explained his late arrival at the circus with a tale of lost shoes.
meanings.sent4: The falling leaves explained the changing seasons to the curious child.
meanings.sent5: The chef explained the unique flavors of the dish to the intrigued diners.
